mapper.select: select nvl(emp.userid,0) nullid ,reg.tel,reg.email,reg.username, reg.userid userid from registers reg left join Partner2 emp on reg.userid = emp.userid where reg.userid= #{param1}

select count(emp_num) totalRecord from registers regi join Partner2 emp on regi.userid = emp.userid join department2 dept on emp.dept_num = dept.dept_num
where ${param1} like '%'||#{param2}||'%'

select * from (select * from (select part_num, part_company, part_name,part_tel,part_email,part_code_name, to_char(part_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') part_regdate from partner
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
order by emp_num desc) where rownum<= ${rnChange} order by emp_num asc) where rownum<= ${onePageRecord} order by emp_num desc

select emp.emp_num, regi.username, regi.tel, regi.email, dept.dept_num, dept.dept_name, emp.emp_posi, to_char(emp.emp_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') emp_regdate from registers regi join Partner2 emp on regi.userid = emp.userid join department2 dept on emp.dept_num = dept.dept_num where emp.emp_num = #{emp_num}
